quest.name: The Heretic among Us
journal: Lord Drillemont requires your assistance in bringing the heretic masquerading as Inquisitor Guillaime to justice.

Lord Drillemont has asked you to accompany him to Snowcloak, where the heretic masquerading as Inquisitor Guillaime is said to be conducting another interrogation. If the impostor refuses to surrender, Lord Drillemont intends to use force. Prepare for the worst and rendezvous with the knights at Snowcloak.

Faced with Lord Drillemont's accusations, the false inquisitor declares that he cannot betray that which he owes no allegiance, and that all Ishgardians must be held to account for their persecution of the heretics. With that, he summons his Dravanian allies and endeavors to defend himself, going so far as to use his magicks to assume the form of a dragon. The ruse serves only to anger Lord Drillemont, however, and with his aid you dispel the heretic's glamour and slay his scalekin accomplices. Defiant to the last, the nameless heretic rejoices in the vengeance he wreaked, predicting with his dying breath that you will meet your end in the Stone Vigil. Return to Whitebrim Front and inform Alphinaud of the impostor's demise.

Alphinaud refuses to revel in your victory over the false inquisitor, declaring that there will be time enough to celebrate when the Enterprise has been secured. Happily, your path into the Stone Vigil now seems clear. All that remains is for you and your companions to pay one final visit to Lord Drillemont.
objectives: Speak with the knight of House Durendaire.

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: That thrice-damned heretic has murdered countless innocents, and made a mockery of our laws! Hells take him and his Dravanian allies!

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: I am told he makes for Snowcloak even now, intending to pass judgment upon yet another poor soul whom he has branded heretic. If we hurry, there may still be time to prevent further tragedy.

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: Lend me your strength, Forename! Together, let us put an end to this impostor's heresy once and for all!

dialogue.name: NPCA
dialogue.text: Good to have you with us, misssir. When Lord Drillemont arrives, we are to confront the inquisitor. If he refuses to go quietly, we will need to use force. Are you prepared for that eventuality?

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: You needn't tremble so, my child. The righteous shall enjoy everlasting peace in Halone's halls. Only the wicked─

dialogue.name: NPCB
dialogue.text: But why!? Why must I die!? By all that is holy, I swear to you that I have never questioned the teachings of Halone!

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: Inquisitor! Release the maid and come with us!

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: My lord Drillemont─what is the meaning of this interruption? You are aware that I am at present conducting an interrogation, are you not?

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: Silence, villain! I name thee heretic, murderer of Inquisitor Guillaime and countless innocents!

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: You are a traitor to Ishgard, to your own kith and kin! Your sins are beyond measure─beyond redemption!

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: Ah...grave allegations indeed. But you will find your logic is flawed. How can I betray that which I owe no allegiance? No, Lord Drillemont─my conscience is quite clear, I assure you.

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: I wonder...can you say the same? You whose hands are black with the blood of those whose only sin was to question your nation's crazed crusade!

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: You speak to me of Ishgardian innocents? Hah! All are complicit in these crimes, for all live their lives by the archbishop's lies.

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: But I know you will not hear me, deafened by dogma as you are. If you desire retribution, Lord Drillemont, then come─let us see how Ishgardian steel fares against Dravanian fang and claw!

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: My glamours...dispelled...

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: Your plans lie in ruin, heretic. Choose your words wisely, for they will be your last.

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: <cough> <wheeze> Hah hah... You may not recall the many Ishgardians I have sentenced, but the families of the dead will never forget. Blood has been repaid with blood, and for that I am content.

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: My...my only regret is that you yet live...

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: But your end is nigh, foreigner. The dragons within the Stone Vigil will rend you asunder. And when you are dead, Whitebrim Front shall fall...

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: Defiant to the last. Leave the body for the crows─his ilk deserves naught better.

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: Forename, I must apologize for involving you in this sordid business. You should never have been asked to intervene in Ishgardian affairs of state.

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: Rest assured, I have not forgotten the matter which first brought you into our midst. It is past time that you were reunited with your airship.

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: But this is not the place to discuss such matters. Pray visit me at Whitebrim Front─and bring your associates.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Where have you been, Forename? ...Hm? The false inquisitor has been slain, has he? Yes, well, his was a tale always like to end in bloodshed.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Though you have overcome the latest in a long line of unfortunate impediments, I would ask you not to revel in your victory just yet.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We can celebrate once we have secured the Enterprise!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Defeat Inquisitor Guillaime!

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: Show the heretic no mercy! He must pay for the innocent blood he has spilled!

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: Ignorant swine! Soon you will know the futility of your faith!

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: Do you see, heretic? You and your allies are no match for the might of Ishgard!

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: How wrong you are, Ishgardian! I have been blessed with power far beyond your ken!

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: Come, my brothers─grant me the strength to smite our enemies!

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: I...am...reborn!

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: Stand your ground─'tis but an illusion!

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: A dragon stands before you, yet still you do not flee!?

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: Your magicks have no power over me, heretic!

dialogue.name: GUILLAIME
dialogue.text: No, NO! It cannot be!

dialogue.name: DRILLEMONT
dialogue.text: Ugh...I swear by the Fury, I will bury my blade into...your...

dialogue.name: FOLLOWER
dialogue.text: For Ish...ga...ahhh...

dialogue.name: FOLLOWER
dialogue.text: Ugh, not by a godsdamned heretic...

obj.n: When a Man Loves a Woman
